intro: Eliminate terrorists hiding in Hong Kong's labyrinthine city! Battle from alleyways to skyscrapers on neon-lit streets. Team up in co-op to defend Hong Kong's peace!
description:
Thwart the ambitions of terrorists in beautiful, neon-lit Hong Kong! Experience powerful top-down action shooting gameplay with a variety of missions ranging from back alleys and skyscrapers to night markets and the Hong Kong sea. Enjoy immersive top-down gameplay with multiple game modes and a wide range of weapons unlocked as you level up. Solo or with a friend, just share a Joy-Con™ and enjoy co-op play anytime, anywhere! Supports 1 to 2 player modes. Pass a Joy-Con™ to another player to "share" and start co-op play wherever you are.

・Simple controls and addictive top-down action shooting gameplay.
・Each stage offers story-driven missions for tense and exciting gameplay.
・Complete the final stage to unlock cinematic movie scenes.
・Features a wide variety of stages.
・Enjoy even more with Story Mode and additional modes.
・Follow the story and complete missions in EPISODE mode.
・Fight off waves of enemies from enemy bases in INVADE mode.
・Defend your position from relentless enemy attacks in DEFENSE mode.
・Complete stages to gain experience and level up.
・Unlock new weapons as you level up.
・Enjoy intense battles with stunning 3D graphics.
・Collect a variety of uniquely designed weapons.
・Upgrade your characters and weapons for even more fun.

Complete the final stage to reach the long-awaited ending! What ending awaits you?
Upgrade your weapons and characters as you progress through numerous stages!
Pass a Joy-Con™ to another player to "share"!
Share and enjoy cooperative play anytime, anywhere.
Play with up to two people and thwart the ambitions of terrorists and criminal organizations!
Become a member of the special Crime Busters unit and protect the peace and future of Hong Kong!
The time has come to end the darkness in Hong Kong!

Prologue
Word has spread that Krueger, the leader of an armed gang, has escaped. He fled to Hong Kong, known as Asia's financial hub with its dazzling skyscrapers and vibrant night markets. Against the backdrop of Victoria Harbor's breathtaking nighttime view, Krueger began to build a new criminal empire by joining forces with the Triad, Hong Kong's most powerful organization.

From the narrow alleys of the Kowloon peninsula to the luxurious buildings of Central, the dangers of illegal arms, drugs, and human trafficking spread. The once-safe streets of Hong Kong now fell into a maelstrom of crime. With the Hong Kong Police helpless, the Crime Busters special unit was immediately dispatched to Hong Kong.

The Crime Busters gather intelligence in the bars of Lan Kwai Fong, pursue suspects in the bustling streets of Tsim Sha Tsui, and sometimes conduct operations while riding on Hong Kong's iconic Star Ferry. Amidst the complex terrain and cultural differences of an unfamiliar city, the Crime Busters battle the Triad and Krueger's forces, launching operations to save beautiful Hong Kong.
